squidpony.squidsound

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidsound.SoundManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Simplified class for working with sound output. If fading is used, this class should be wrapped in a Thread to allow automatic volume adjustments as needed.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com

        public void playSoundFX(java.lang.String key)

        Parameters:

        public void playMusic(java.lang.String key)
